resources.string: Setup is incomplete! Please review the interactive setup once, even if you successfully configured a previous version of the app.
I\'m your new DJ! Well, sort\'ve. As you listen to songs, say in a coffee shop for example, your Pixel 2 will auto recognize them and I\'ll keep track of them!
To get started, I need permission for one little thing
I need to access to notifications. Press `Grant Permission` and on the following screen toggle the slide for `Now Playing - History`
Looks like you already finished setup once. \n\nIf you are still having issues with notifications, try rebooting the phone and setup again. If that does not work, try reinstalling the app.
